title: How Braintrust and Claude transform hiring and recruitment \ Anthropic

metadata.title: How Braintrust and Claude transform hiring and recruitment \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Learn how Braintrust uses Claude to achieve 25% more applicants and 90% successful matches, while saving recruiters time with AI-powered screening and job descriptions.
